sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：匈奴絕和親，攻當路塞；
sentences.literal: The Grand Historian said: The Xiongnu broke the peace alliance and attacked the border passes along the route;
Minyue arbitrarily invaded, Dong'ou requested surrender.

sentences.chinese: 二夷交侵，當盛漢之隆，以此知功臣受封侔於祖考矣。
sentences.literal: Two barbarian tribes mutually invaded at a time when Han was at its most flourishing. From this we know that meritorious ministers received enfeoffments comparable to their ancestors.
Why is this?

sentences.chinese: 自詩書稱三代「戎狄是膺，荊荼是徵」，太史公曰：齊桓越燕伐山戎，武靈王以區區趙服單于，秦繆用百里霸西戎，吳楚之君以諸侯役百越。
sentences.literal: Since the Poetry and Documents speak of the Three Dynasties 'repelling the Rong and Di, punishing Jing and Chu', the Grand Historian said: Duke Huan of Qi crossed Yan to attack the Shanrong; King Wuling with his small state of Zhao subdued the Chanyu; Duke Mu of Qin used Baili Xi to hegemonize the Western Rong; the rulers of Wu and Chu used the feudal lords to make the Hundred Yue submit.

sentences.chinese: 況乃以中國一統，明天子在上，兼文武，席卷四海，內輯億萬之眾，豈以晏然不為邊境征伐哉！
sentences.literal: How much more so with China unified, the enlightened Son of Heaven above, combining civil and military, sweeping across the four seas, internally gathering crowds of millions—how could they peacefully not conduct border campaigns!

sentences.chinese: 自是後，遂出師北討彊胡，南誅勁越，將卒以次封矣。
sentences.literal: From this time afterward, they sent out armies to attack the strong Hu to the north, executed the strong Yue to the south; generals and soldiers were successively enfeoffed.

sentences.chinese: 匈奴相降，侯。元朔二年，屬車騎將軍，擊匈奴有功，益封。
sentences.literal: Xiongnu prime minister surrendered, became Marquis. Yuanshuo second year: Attached to General of Chariots and Cavalry, attacked Xiongnu with merit, enfeoffment increased.

sentences.chinese: 三。四年七月壬午，侯趙信元年。
sentences.literal: Three. Fourth year, seventh month, renwu day: Marquis Zhao Xin first year.

sentences.chinese: 五。六年，侯信為前將軍擊匈奴，遇單于兵，敗，信降匈奴，國除。
sentences.literal: Five. Sixth year: Marquis Xin as Forward General attacked Xiongnu, encountered Chanyu troops, was defeated; Xin surrendered to Xiongnu, state abolished.
Chi Zhuang
Xiongnu colonel surrendered, became Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 六年後九月丙寅，侯樂。元年。
sentences.literal: Sixth year, ninth month, after bingyin day: Marquis Yue first year.
Six
Six
First year: Marquis Yue died, no posterity, state abolished.
Qin Yang
Xiongnu prime minister surrendered, became Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 三。二年十月癸巳，侯月氏元年。五年，侯月氏坐亡斬，國除。
sentences.literal: Three. Second year, tenth month, guisi day: Marquis Yue Zhi first year. Fifth year: Marquis Yue Zhi convicted of fleeing, decapitated, state abolished.
Ruo Yang
Xiongnu prime minister surrendered, became Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 三。二年十月癸巳，侯猛元年。五年，侯猛坐亡斬，國除。
sentences.literal: Three. Second year tenth month gui si, Marquis Meng first year. Fifth year, Marquis Meng convicted of fleeing decapitation, state abolished.
Chang Ping.

sentences.chinese: 以元朔二年再以車騎將軍擊匈奴，取朔方、河南功侯。元朔五年，以大將軍擊匈奴，破右賢王，益封三千戶。
sentences.literal: With Yuanshuo second year again as General of Chariots and Cavalry attacked Xiongnu, achieved merit in taking Shuofang and Henan, Marquis. Yuanshuo fifth year, as Grand General attacked Xiongnu, defeated Right Wise King, increased enfeoffment by three thousand households.

sentences.chinese: 五。二年三月丙辰，烈侯衛青元年。
sentences.literal: Five. Second year third month bing chen, Marquis Lie Wei Qing first year.
Six
Six
Six
Taichu first year, current Marquis Kang first year.
Ping Ling.

sentences.chinese: 以都尉從車騎將軍青擊匈奴功侯。以元朔五年，用遊擊將軍從大將軍，益封。
sentences.literal: As colonel followed General of Chariots and Cavalry Qing attacked Xiongnu with merit, Marquis. With Yuanshuo fifth year, as Roaming General followed Grand General, increased enfeoffment.

sentences.chinese: 五。二年三月丙辰，侯蘇建元年。
sentences.literal: Five. Second year third month bing chen, Marquis Su Jian first year.
Six

sentences.chinese: 六。六年，侯建為右將軍，與翕侯信俱敗，獨身脫來歸，當斬，贖，國除。
sentences.literal: Six. Sixth year, Marquis Jian as Right General, together with Marquis Xi Xin were defeated, alone escaped and returned, should be executed, ransomed, state abolished.
An Tou.

sentences.chinese: 以都尉從車騎將軍青擊匈奴功侯。元朔六年，從大將軍，益封。
sentences.literal: As colonel followed General of Chariots and Cavalry Qing attacked Xiongnu with merit, Marquis. Yuanshuo sixth year, followed Grand General, increased enfeoffment.

sentences.chinese: 五。二年六月壬辰，侯張次公元年。
sentences.literal: Five. Second year sixth month ren chen, Marquis Zhang Ci Gong first year.

sentences.chinese: 元年，次公坐與淮南王女姦，及受財物罪，國除。
sentences.literal: First year, Marquis Ci Gong convicted of adultery with daughter of King of Huainan, and accepting bribes crime, state abolished.
Ping Jin.
As Chancellor memorialized for praise, Marquis.

sentences.chinese: 四。五年十一月乙丑，獻侯公孫弘元年。
sentences.literal: Four. Fifth year eleventh month yi chou, Marquis Xian Gong Sun Hong first year.
